meanings.definition: The quality or state of being able to be transported.
meanings.sent1: The transportability of the package made it easy to carry.
meanings.sent2: The transportability of the suitcase allowed for convenient travel.
meanings.sent3: The transportability of the cake made it a breeze to bring to the party.
meanings.sent4: The transportability of the idea spread quickly among the group.
meanings.sent5: The transportability of the cloud across the sky was mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: The ability to be easily moved or carried from one place to another.
meanings.sent1: We appreciated the transportability of the chairs during the event setup.
meanings.sent2: The transportability of the boxes made the moving process smoother.
meanings.sent3: The transportability of the joke had everyone laughing as it traveled around the room.
meanings.sent4: The transportability of the melody from the piano filled the entire hall.
meanings.sent5: The transportability of the scent from the flowers wafted through the garden.
